contacts.name: Peter Clemenza
contacts.notes: Old-school capo. Handles collections and enforcers.

contacts.name: Salvatore Tessio
contacts.notes: Efficient but watchful. Political ties in Brooklyn.

contacts.name: Luca Brasi
contacts.notes: Don Vito's personal enforcer. Fearsome reputation.

contacts.name: Al Neri
contacts.notes: Ex-cop turned enforcer. Michael's personal security.

contacts.name: Carmine Cuneo
contacts.notes: 'The Milkman'. His criminal activities had never been suspected by the police thanks to good nature.

contacts.name: Johnny Fontane
contacts.notes: Strategic media influence. Opens key doors.

contacts.name: Virgil Sollozzo
contacts.notes: Heavily armed, politically connected. High threat.

contacts.name: Philip Tattaglia
contacts.notes: Weak without Sollozzo. Minor threat alone.

contacts.name: Victor Stracci
contacts.notes: Deals with prostitution. Family is weaker than the Tattaglias.

contacts.name: Amerigo Bonasera
contacts.notes: Vito's wife Carmela is a godmother to Bonasera's daughter Maria. He ran a funeral parlour

contacts.name: Hyman Roth
contacts.notes: Key for offshore deals. Not fully trusted.

contacts.name: Willie Cicci
contacts.notes: Efficient but talks too much. Needs watching.
